## Get wanding data

```{r dataWandingOptions, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(message = FALSE, warning = FALSE)
```

```{r librariesdataWanding, echo = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
library(getWBData)
library(targets)
library(kableExtra)
```

Data are generated in `R/getDataWanding-targets.R` [file](https://github.com/bletcher/wbBook_quarto_targets/blob/main/R/getDataWanding_targets.R)  


## Get wanding data target

```{r dataWanding}

cdWB_wanding0 <- tar_read(cdWB_wanding0_target)
str(cdWB_wanding0)

```

```{r}
#| label: tbl-wandAll
#| tbl-cap: "Count of wanding data by river"

cdWB_wanding0 %>% 
  group_by(riverOrdered, cohort) %>% 
  summarize(n = n()) %>%
  pivot_wider(values_from = "n", names_from = "riverOrdered") %>%
  arrange(cohort) %>%
  kable() %>%
  kable_styling(full_width = T)
```
